summary: I am a student pursuing my Masters from Concordia University, and also working as a Fronted Engineer at Kami Vision. I enjoys programming and problem-solving and sees hacking on software as a way of life rather than just a job.

highlights: Experience creating reusable UI components using React.js to build modern and responsive user interfaces.
Proficiency in integrating backend APIs with frontend components using popular frameworks such as Axios.
Integrated AWS Kinesis Video Streams with app to see live view from cameras.
Experience working collaboratively with cross-functional teams, including product managers, designers, and software engineers.
Made meaningful changes in kamicare and kamihome site that improved user experience and increased user interaction on web-site.
Worked on creating user friendly UI for kami secure, B2B product of company.

work.summary: Backend APIs development(Node.js), Sequelize ORM, Flutter App development, Firebase push Notification
highlights: Developed full stack application in Flutter and node.js to make help healthcare system more accessible to instituteâ€™s employees.
Created API endpoints to perform various operation related to User, Hospital, Doctor, and Chemists.
Developed and implemented REST APIs using Sequelize ORM, that provided integration between the application and the database.

Implemented transactions in Sequelize ORM to manage critical operations, such as creating multiple related records or updating multiple tables simultaneously, ensuring data consistency and reliability.
Added features like Role based access, Searching, Push notification and basic user functionalities.
Push notification conveyed real-time updates to user and it increased user interaction drastically with app.

projects.name: Kubeflow-GNN
highlights: Developed a graph neural network (GNN) model to perform link property prediction in a citation network using SAGEConv.
Deployed the GNN model training as a PyTorchJob in Kubeflow, implementing PyTorch training operator.
Performed distributed training of the model using DDP (DistributedDataParallel) and measured accuracy and training time with different epochs and number of workers.

projects.name: Advertisement Management System
highlights: Developed a comprehensive online solution to facilitate the connection between influencers and brands, enabling effective brand advertising on multiple social media platforms
Utilized Cloudinary as a cloud-based storage solution for managing and storing photos.
Incorporated advance functionality like Razorpay payment gateway and search.
Frotend was created using React.js and API endpoints in Node.js to handle all the operations.
